name: Zaton's Revenge
description:
ZATON HAS COME BACK FULL FORCE!!!!!

If you thought you have defeated Zaton and saved the galaxy well guess what? Zaton has been brought back and this time he controls a mothership that can send out enemy fighters to destroy the galaxy. Now you must once again hop on your star fighter and combat the evil forces of Zaton. Disarm the barrier by destroying 4 stations and enter the mothership. Next you must destroy all the generators to disarm the force and blast Zaton back to space dust.

CONTROLS

Xbox controller

Left Paddle = rotate ship

A button = Move forward

X Button = Shoot Laser

LBT = End Game

RBT = Reset Game
